  • Classes in etri.sdn.controller used by etri.sdn.controller 
    Class and Description
    IListener.Command
    This class is not used, soon be deprecated out of the source code.
    IOFTask
    This is an interface for a task that asynchronously scheduled to be executed.
    IService
    This is an interface class for all Service class to implement.
    MessageContext
    This is a context object where listeners can register and later retrieve context information associated with an event.
    OFController
    Mother of all OpenFlow controller implementations.
    OFController.QI
    Queue Item
    OFController.QP
    Queue Item Processor, which is a thread that pulls QI object from the queue that is associated with the thread.
    OFMFilter
    This class is to filer OFMessage objects coming from the connections to switches with given condition.
    OFModel
    This is a class that represents a data structure that holds all the important data of a module.
    OFModel.RESTApi
    This is a superclass of all REST API implementations.
    OFModule
    This abstract class is mother of all Torpedo modules.
    RESTApiServer
    A REST API server class.
    RestApiServerApplication
    This is a REST API server application class required to create a REST API Server ((RESTApiServer).
    TorpedoProperties
    This class implements a functionality that reads Torpedo configuration file (torpedo.properties in the project root directory).
